column1: Smoque BBQ////I also sampled the pulled pork (very subpar)
column2: the St. Louis style ribs (not bad
column3: but not great) which had a really strong smoky flavor
column4: but it just didn't jive with my taste buds I s'pose. The baby back ribs were a big let down. Kinda tough
column6: and they needed quite a bit of sauce.
